questions: How can individuals apply “Begin with the End in Mind” in their personal life?
Follow-up: What is the role of a personal mission statement in this habit?
How does Covey define “Put First Things First”?
answers: Individuals can apply "Begin with the End in Mind" in their personal life by starting with a clear understanding of their destination, knowing where they're going, and aligning their daily actions with their long-term vision and values.

The role of a personal mission statement in this habit is to help individuals focus on what they want to be (character) and do (contributions and achievements) based on their values or principles. It serves as a guiding document to align behavior and attitude with deepest values and correct principles, enabling proactive and value-driven decision-making.
